document_data.name: Absolute Immunity
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite document/Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn Game Manual|171}}
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the spell that protected against weapons|the spell created by [[Anastra Syluné Silverhand]]|Syluné's absolute immunity}}
'''''Absolute immunity''''' was an incredibly powerful [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s for defense.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell protected the caster from all mundane and magical weapons. Only powerful enchantments on a magical weapon were able to defeat this spell. Both the casting time and the duration of this spell were incredibly short.
